name: The Invasion Of The Dogba
description:
The Dogba are an ancient alien race, and they are here to conquer earth!!

In the adventure you play as one of the Dogba's scout member named Dogba. He isn't the brightest of the scouts but he really work hard. His mission is to discover the most valuable thing mankind possess. He lands in Kuwait by mistake. But later goes around the world to complete his mission. 

The invasion of the Dogba is a mini-games adventure game. Each stage has its own rules and systems . In this demo you play only on stage but we show the ideas we had for the other levels. 

 The Controls:

Esc button to escape cutscene 

Click on on the icons then:
1-Rythem game move the arrow keys left-up-right.
2-Text game write the sentences (Case sensitive).
